oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CERTCOST News
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rebsdorf, Simon Olling
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Values, standards and certification
Consumer issues
Regulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
This is the second CERTCOST newsletter. CERTCOST stands for economic analysis of certification systems for organic food and farming This analysis is done in collaboration between stakeholders and scientific experts.
More and more results of the project become available, Some highlights you find in this newsletter. More detailed information is at the project website www.certcost.org
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Rebsdorf, Simon Olling (2011) CERTCOST News. CERTCOST Newsletter, 2011, pp. 1-6.
